about_the_game:
Ever wanted to save the galaxy and fall in love? Now’s your chance.

Eden Survivors is a wild mix of rogue-like action, Visual Novel storytelling, and unapologetic adult content. You play as ACE—engineer by day, vigilante by night—leading a team of badass heroines as you build a killer mech and battle to save the galaxy from the brink of destruction. Along the way, you’ll flirt, seduce, and dive into unforgettable romances with the galaxy’s hottest babes.

  • 80,000 Words of Narrative Feast: Romance, mystery, and intergalactic chaos—it’s like your favorite space opera but with more steamy moments.

  • Romance and Relationships: Every heroine brings her own unique skills and story to the table. Flirt, chat, and gift your way into their hearts. (or at least their good side)

    When you're not fighting monsters, you’re managing the galaxy’s coolest hangout.

  • The Eden Bar: Your home base for adventure, intrigue, and some seriously questionable decisions.

  • Strategize Like a Pro: Attract patrons, rake in profits, and unlock more heroines. Every choice matters—no pressure.

  • Make It Personal: Flirt with your squad, uncover their secrets, and unlock special events.

Suit up, Commander. Things are about to get hot!

  • Mech Customization: Assign your heroines, stack over 500+ upgrades in different builds, and create combos so OP they’ll make the devs blush.

  • 140 Monsters, 30 Levels, 40 Bosses: From space bugs to galaxy-crushing titans, every chapter is a new challenge.

  • Clash Mode: Take on epic bosses in ranked multiplayer. Start in Iron and grind your way to the Master division.

  • Dynamic Game Modes: Got stuck on the main story? Plenty more action to be had: trial mode, skill trees, unique daily and weekly events.

  • So, what kind of player are you? The tactician, meticulously crafting the perfect mech? The storyteller, unraveling romances and galactic intrigue? Or maybe the stud, here to conquer hearts as well as the galaxy? Or maybe all three?

    Whatever your style, Eden Survivors has you covered.

    Suit up, Commander!

  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (e.g., Intel Core i3-6100 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 or DX12 compatible Integrated Graphics (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 520)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX10, DX11, or DX12 capable

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 or DX12 compatible GPU (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti or better)
